## EthersARTH.getARTHBalance() method

Get the amount of ARTH held by an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getARTHBalance(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address whose balance should be retrieved. |
|  overrides | [EthersCallOverrides](./arth-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt;
